Package hk.edu.hkmu.lib.cat

Class MarcConversion

java.lang.Object
hk.edu.hkmu.lib.cat.MarcConversion
public class MarcConversion
extends java.lang.Object
Complete various MARC tags conversion requirements which are defined in config.txt.

Jan 29, 2019

Author:
